attributes.action: to get dogs that cause serious injury to other dogs put down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to change the law,so that when a dog attacks another dog unprovoked and causes serious injury or death to the other dog then it should be classified as a dangerous dog and be put down.if the law is changed it might make owners be more responsible with dogs that attack other dogs by keeping them under control.
